original_title: Build SL 2023 international expo to kickstart tomorrow
original_body_lines: The much looked forward to Build SL 2023 Housing and Construction Exhibition will commence tomorrow at the BMICH (Sirimavo Bandaranaike Memorial Exhibition Hall) under the distinguished patronage of Deputy Ambassador of Japan for Sri Lanka Kotaro Katsuki.

The event will commence at 10 a.m. and continue until 7 p.m. daily on 26, 27 and 28 May. Displays experience the products and services of 200 stalls in this unrivalled housing and construction exhibition.
